/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and street lamps punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and light to the urban setting. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
